pkgmetadata.longdescription: Occlusion Surface Using the Occluded Surface and Fibonacci Occluded Surface // The Occluded Surface (OS) algorithm is a widely used approach for analyzing atomic packing in biomolecules as described by Pattabiraman N, Ward KB, Fleming PJ (1995) doi:10.1002/jmr.300080603. Here, we introduce 'fibos', an 'R' and 'Python' package that extends the 'OS' methodology, as presented in Soares HHM, Romanelli JPR, Fleming PJ, da Silveira CH (2024) doi:10.1101/2024.11.01.621530.
